programmes.show_description: Manara drops her annual Valentine's Shades On Mix packed full of anthems about heartbreak, betrayal and yearning. Contains strong language.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Shades On Mix with DJ Manara

AJD spins Badshah and Davido before mixing Arif Lohar, Sammy Virji and Zulekha plus throwbacks from the film Cocktail and a UKG flex from Imran Khan. Plus the All Star Anthems.
AJD brings one hour of unapologetically loud and proud Punjabi tunes starting with new Karan Aujla, Raf Saperra's dance collaboration and Panjabi MC with a bassline banger.
Celebrating the greatest artists and icons from South Asian music, film and pop culture. Asian Network Celebrates British singer-songwriter Zack Knight.

programmes.show_description: Sonia Sabri, who runs her own South Asian dance and music company, joins Harleen Nottay to discuss how she became a successful entrepreneur in the arts world.
